mapper.select:
select a.*, b.name, b.co_url from board a, member b where a.mem_id = b.mem_id and a.mem_id = #{memId}
and noti_ttl like '%' || #{notiTtl} || '%'

SELECT prj_id, prj_ttl FROM project where prj_knd = 'C' and co_url = #{coUrl} union SELECT a.prj_id, a.prj_ttl FROM project a, prj_parti b where a.prj_knd = 'N' and a.prj_id = b.prj_id and b.mem_id = #{memId} and a.co_url = #{coUrl} union SELECT c.prj_id, c.prj_ttl FROM project c, prj_parti d where c.prj_knd = 'N' and c.prj_open_perm = 'all' and c.prj_id = d.prj_id and c.co_url = #{coUrl}
and noti_ttl like '%' || #{notiTtl} || '%'

select a.*, b.name from schedule a, member b where a.mem_id = b.mem_id
and noti_ttl like '%' || #{notiTtl} || '%'

select a.noti_ttl, b.txt_file from board a, text b where a.noti_id = b.noti_id
and noti_ttl like '%' || #{notiTtl} || '%'

select a.noti_knd, a.noti_ttl, c.name, a.noti_dttm from board a, bookmark b, member c where a.mem_id = b.mem_id and b.mem_id = c.mem_id and b.noti_id = #{notiId}
and noti_ttl like '%' || #{notiTtl} || '%'

select a. noti_knd, b.name, c.*, d.prj_ttl, a.noti_dttm from notice_writing a, member b, text c, project d where a.mem_id = b.mem_id and a.prj_id = d.prj_id and a.noti_id = c.noti_id and a.noti_id= #{notiId}

select a. noti_knd, b.name, c.*, d.prj_ttl, a.noti_dttm from notice_writing a, member b, task c, project d where a.mem_id = b.mem_id and a.prj_id=d.prj_id and a.noti_id = c.noti_id and a.noti_id= #{notiId}
select a.*, b.name, c.subtsk_cntn from board a, member b, subtask c where a.mem_id = b.mem_id and a.noti_id = c.noti_id and a.mem_id = #{memId}
select a.*, b.name, c.sche_cntn from board a, member b, schedule c where a.mem_id = b.mem_id and a.noti_id = c.noti_id and a.noti_id = #{notiId}

select a. noti_knd, b.name, c.*, d.prj_ttl, a.noti_dttm from notice_writing a, member b, todo c, project d where a.mem_id = b.mem_id and a.prj_id=d.prj_id and a.noti_id = c.noti_id and b.mem_id = c.mem_id and c.noti_id = #{notiId}

select a.*, b.name from board a, member b where a.mem_id = b.mem_id and a.prj_id = #{prjId}
and noti_ttl like '%' || #{notiTtl} || '%'
select a.*, b.name from board a, member b where a.mem_id = b.mem_id and a.noti_knd = 'task' and a.prj_id = #{prjId}
